DATOS DE PRUEBA
tol = 1e-7
n = 100
en = abs(xn - x(n-1)) -- error absoluto
f = log((sin(x))**2+1)-(1/2)
f' = 2*((sin(x))**2+1)**(-1)*sin(x)*cos(x)
f1 = log((sin(x))**2+1)-(1/2)-x
g = log((sin(x))**2+1)-(1/2)
h = e**x-x-1
h' = e**x-1
h'' = e**x 
A = [[2,-1,0,3],[1,0.5,3,8],[0,13,-2,11],[14,5,-2,3]]
b = [1,1,1,1]
